mapper.select: SELECT RESERVE_ROOM, '1' AS RESERVED FROM RESERVE WHERE #{reserve_date} = TO_CHAR(RESERVE_DATE,'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT TO_CHAR(RESERVE_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS RESERVE_DATE, RESERVE_ROOM, NAME, PHONE FROM RESERVE WHERE #{reserve_date} <= TO_CHAR(RESERVE_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY RESERVE_DATE

SELECT TO_CHAR(RESERVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESERVE_DATE, RESERVE_ROOM, ARRIVE, PERSONS, VACCINE, REQUEST, RESERVE_NUM, '0' AS REMOVABLE FROM RESERVE WHERE NAME = #{name} AND PHONE = #{phone} AND TO_CHAR(RESERVE_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
UNION ALL
SELECT TO_CHAR(RESERVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESERVE_DATE, RESERVE_ROOM, ARRIVE, PERSONS, VACCINE, REQUEST, RESERVE_NUM, '1' AS REMOVABLE FROM RESERVE WHERE NAME = #{name} AND PHONE = #{phone} AND TO_CHAR(RESERVE_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY RESERVE_DATE

SELECT RESERVE_ROOM, MIN(RESERVE_DATE - TO_DATE(#{reserve_date},'YYYYMMDD')) AS DURATIONDATE FROM RESERVE WHERE TO_CHAR(RESERVE_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #{reserve_date} AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{reserve_date},'YYYYMMDD')+9 ,'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY RESERVE_ROOM
